name: Livebiznet
tag_list: business-network, professional-network, people-network, smb, small--medium-business, smb-network, livechat
overview:
Livebiznet is a business & professionals network.

For businesses, Livebiznet provides a platform to build a business centric profile, connect to staff members, expand business contacts, improve business processes, showcase products and marketing material, find professionals to close job requirements.

Livebiznet offers professional registration too. Professionals can Re-connect with friends and colleagues, Get job offers to their inbox and Become an expert to earn.

The network helps businesses increase sales by allowing them to exchange opportunities and powering businesses with sales accelerator. Sales accelerator is a free Livechat solution that increases online sales and reduces support costs. ‘Live’biznet as the name suggests gets the concept of LIVE network by adding features that allow users to chat instantly over the network. All the staff members of a company can be grouped for an easier way to communicate with one another and explore contacts. Users get insight into 1st level contacts, their contacts ie., 2nd level contacts and 3rd level contacts too.

This is a platform designed for both professionals and business companies where both find their exclusive presence and leverage on networking optimally by broadcasting themselves in every conceivable way for any of their professional or business needs.

While boasting on its difference Livebiznet claims to have brought the future of networking for businesses and professionals says the CEO.
